entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
